Mary T. Denis

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Beny and Mary E. Metcalf
  3. Location of Family: Auburn, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1888-05, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Notes: In the 1900 census, Mary Denis is listed as the Metcalfs' adopted daughter. Mary no longer lived in the Metcalf houshold in 1910.
  10. Source: 1900 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census.
